price: Nítorí náà, Allāhu tó ní Ẹlẹ́rìí láààrin àwa àti ẹ̀yin pé àwa jẹ́ aláìmọ̀ nípa ìjọ́sìn yín (tí ẹ̀ ṣe fún wa).”
arabic: فَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدَۢا بَيۡنَنَا وَبَيۡنَكُمۡ إِن كُنَّا عَنۡ عِبَادَتِكُمۡ لَغَٰفِلِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fakafā bil-lahi shahīdan baynanā wabaynakum in kunnā ʿan ʿibādatikum laghāfilīna
